name: Herder (itch)
description:
You control a herding dog and you have a minute to guide different coloured sheep into their matching pens. 

WASD to move.

SPACE to dash for a speed boost.

This  project was made in 3 hours for Trijam #181 by a team of 6 people, using Unreal Engine  4. 

Design - Aaron Colledge

Tech - Justin Beasley

Art- Becky Farr,    Dan Smedley, Rachel Lablaine

Sheep Sound Effects - Nathan Haywood

Font used: Chewy    https://www.1001freefonts.com/chewy.font

Music:   https://freesound.org/people/Frozentape/
